name: claw-kanban
description: AI Agent Orchestration Kanban Board - Route tasks to Claude Code, Codex CLI, and Gemini CLI with role-based auto-assignment

scripts.dev: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,magenta "cross-env VITE_DEV=1 vite --host 0.0.0.0 --port 5173" "cross-env VITE_DEV=1 HOST=0.0.0.0 nodemon --watch server --ext ts --exec tsx server/index.ts"
scripts.dev:local: concurrently -n web,api -c cyan,magenta "cross-env VITE_DEV=1 vite --host 127.0.0.1 --port 5173" "cross-env VITE_DEV=1 HOST=127.0.0.1 nodemon --watch server --ext ts --exec tsx server/index.ts"

author: GreenSheep01201
